meanings.definition: A cushioned seat or footstool without arms or a back.
meanings.sent1: The living room had colorful pouffes for extra seating.
meanings.sent2: She placed her feet on the pouffes while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat claimed the pouffes as its throne.
meanings.sent4: The pouffes in the waiting room welcomed tired visitors.
meanings.sent5: The pouffes added a cozy touch to the room.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is puffed out in a rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: Her elegant updo included pouffes at the crown.
meanings.sent2: The retro pouffes were popular in the 1960s.
meanings.sent3: The pouffes in her hair made her look taller.
meanings.sent4: Her pouffes hairstyle was the talk of the party.
meanings.sent5: The pouffes added volume to her hair.

meanings.sent1: The pouffes on the couch matched the curtains.
meanings.sent2: She hugged the soft pouffes while reading a book.
meanings.sent3: The pouffes on the bed were arranged in a heart shape.
meanings.sent4: The pouffes in the nursery had cute animal prints.
meanings.sent5: The pouffes were perfect for a cozy movie night.
